user.title: BluPow: Renogy Bluetooth
user.description: Select your Renogy device from the list below.

errors.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Please ensure it is online, in range, and not connected to another app (like the Renogy app on your phone).

abort.no_devices_found: No compatible Renogy devices found. Please ensure your device is powered on and within Bluetooth range.
